application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Mature Lombardy Poplar (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 21.00m: (Located front of block-far east far corner): Remove ivy throughout crown. Ensure skeletal ivy is severed near to ground level 30cm distance swathe. Re-pollard: Reduce back to previous and most recent pollard points. Remove major dead wood. General maintenance.Mature Poplar (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 22.00m: Ivy clad. Remove ivy throughout crown. Remove front secondary sucker stem overhanging garden and parking area. Re-pollard: reduce back to previous and most recent pollard points. Remove major dead wood.Group of Mature Sycamores (applicants ref. G1) - Approximately 14.00m: Overhanging from various properties on Corringham Road: Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches overhanging parking area of Corringham Court by up to 3.00m, selecting suitable growth points and furnishing growth to ensure crown continuity. Control encroachment. General maintenance.Group of Laurels (applicants ref. G2) - Approximately 4.00m: Prune hard back from parking area, approximately 1.20m. To control encroachment.Mature Lombardy Poplar (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 22.00m: Remove ivy as is practicable. Re-pollard: Reduce back to previous and most recent pollard points. Remove dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.Mature Poplar (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 22.00m: Re-pollard: (Whole Tree): Reduce back to previous and most recent pollard points to include high crown. Remove major dead wood throughout. General maintenance.Mature Sycamore (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 14.00m: Reduce lateral and sub lateral branches overhanging Corringham Court and growing towards the building by approximately 2.50m. To help control encroachment.Mature Elm (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 12.00m: Fell to ground level. Dead Tree. Potentially unsafe and should be removed.
